faq.question: How can I get involved in a ministry?
faq.answer: Start by attending our services and talking with ministry leaders. We'll help match your interests and gifts with our ministry needs.

faq.question: Do I need experience to volunteer?
faq.answer: No experience required! We provide training and support for all volunteers. What matters most is a heart to serve.

faq.question: What ministries are available for children?
faq.answer: We offer nursery care, children's church, Sunday school, and seasonal programs like Vacation Bible School for ages 0-11.

faq.question: How often do ministries meet?
faq.answer: Most ministries meet weekly, with some meeting monthly or seasonally. Each ministry has its own schedule to accommodate different commitments.

faq.question: Can visitors participate in ministries?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Visitors are welcome to participate in most ministry activities. Some leadership roles may require membership or completion of our volunteer process.
